description: Safety Partners will help determine what level of decommissioning you need by reviewing lease terms and conditions, assessing hazardous materials used, observing your facility operations and building conditions, and discussing appropriate liability protection. We have established 2 tiers of this service, offerings can be customized to fit your lab and organization’s needs.

name: Laboratory Closures or Moves
description: OEHS will complete a Laboratory Decommissioning Checklist and notify the PI and appropriate administrative unit of the decommissioning inspection results. The appropriate follow-up will be completed by OEHS depending upon the type of hazards present in the lab.

name: Laboratory and Lab Equipment Cleaning Products
description: IPC laboratory and lab equipment cleaning products meet the most rigorous specifications for laboratory cleanliness. Free samples for validation testing.

name: Lab Equipment Cleaning Services
description: Maintain precision and compliance with Pristinology’s lab equipment cleaning services. From pipettes to centrifuges, we ensure every tool is spotless and ready for use.
